thread.section_title: Evergreen.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Evergreen.ie | www.evergreen.ie
thread.title: Liam

author: Liam
title: Liam
text: I found Evergreen when browsing on my laptop recently. The product I was looking for was 25% cheaper than what I had been paying in a local health shop so I ordered two and got free delivery. My item arrived within three days and I was kept updated by email from Evergreen. I found Evergreen were very efficient and professional in dealing with me. I got great value for money and I will have no hesitation in ordering from them again.
